title: A Place for everything
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Svenska filminstitutet and Eric M Nilsson
brief_description: Eric Nilsson examines the attitudes of Swedish young people, and others critical of the well-ordered society. The established institutions are considered to be inflexible, and lacking in dynamism. A plea is made for independence, imagination, and more discussion of existing conditions.
